account_overview_sales.query: SELECT * FROM `insightsprod.boxoutllc_4517_prod_presentation.account_overview_sales` WHERE date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE('{data_interval_end}'), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND DATE('{data_interval_end}')
